function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Publication of controversial health guidelines","Impact":"Misinformation and confusion among the general public","Mitigation":"Ensuring guidelines are thoroughly researched and peer-reviewed","Technologies":"Peer review systems, research databases","People":"General public","Owner":"Health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Installing ventilation systems and air filters","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"}]}
